Padded Dog Vest Harness: Adjustable dog harness features breathable mesh fabric, strong velcro closure, buckle strap and heavy-duty metal rings for easy and safe dog leash attachment
Fits Most Breeds: This dog walking harness medium was designed to fit most medium breeds of dogs. Please refer to our sizing chart and choose a larger size if your dog is between sizes. Medium: fits 16 – 17 in chest, 11 – 12 in neck.
3 Security Measures: The velcro straps allow you to wrap the harness snug without catching his fur. The buckle secures and provides quick-release, while double rings ensure leash safety at all times
Pet Supplies for Furry Friends: We are pet owners first and business owners second, making our own products and standing behind them

item.content:encoded:
Price: $23.58
(as of Nov 30,2022 06:14:05 UTC – Details)

Product Description

A Good Walk Starts with Comfort—for Both You and Your Dog!

Waldsmuller No Pull Adjustable Dog Harness and Leash Set – Designed for Your Dog, and You.

Enjoying a walk in the park with your dog obediently at your heels is a dream activity of many pet owners. It is very convenient and safe for dogs to have a comfortable no pull vest harness and leash combination.

Dog Harness + Leash Set

Dog Leash

The dog harness has different size and color can be selected,Harness is equipped with a traction rope of the black color, A comfortable cushion cotton is added to the handshaking part of the traction rope.Prevent the hand from being injured due to excessive tension. It is convenient, beautiful and comfortable. No Pull Dog Harness

Our non-pulling dog harness is specially designed with 2 metal D shape clip for safer dog walks.The harness for dogs is made with a soft, breathable air mesh, which is high-density, soft and comfortable, and can prevent chewing or tearing. This lightweight dog harness is perfect for walks all year round.

What you will get: 1 X Dog harness 1 X Dog Leash 1 X Dog Collar

Comfort Padded Handle

Special foam padded handle design gives you a more comfortable grip than ever, protecting your hands from rope burn even your dog pulls. O-ring on the handle allows you to easily attach a waste bag or keys.

More Durable, Much Safer

This heavy duty dog leash is made ofstronger than other rock climbing rope which is reinforced with durable woven design. Sturdy enough for medium dogs.

360° Swivel Clasp

360 degree tangle free swivel heavy duty clasp gives your dog best freedom.Say “no” to the rope twining during outdoor walking, hiking, playing with your dog.

High Quality Reflective Rope

When walking your dog at night, visibility is key to the safety of you and your dog. Highly reflective threads keep high visibility at night for safety.

Please refer to this size chart,there may be 0-3cm diggerence in measurement data,please measure your dog before purchasing or inquiry us !

for pets

Package Dimensions ‏ : ‎ 9.76 x 8.82 x 2.48 inches; 1.04 Pounds
Date First Available ‏ : ‎ July 7, 2022
Manufacturer ‏ : ‎ Waldseemüller
ASIN ‏ : ‎ B0B5Q9F7X1

Comfy Padded Handle: Our dog harness has a soft handle on the top of the harness, The handle is made of a soft sponge, comfortable and firm, It can restrain dogs easily and is also perfect for walking them up steps, stairs, and cars, etc. You can grab it quickly and keep control of your dog when they go crazy or when they need help.
Standard Leash: The 5ft dog leash is reinforced with a durable woven design, Special foam padded handle design gives you a more comfortable grip than ever, protecting your hands from rope burn even your dog pulls. The O-ring on the leash handle allows you to easily attach a trash bag or keys.
Reflective Design for Night Safety: When walking your dog after dinner, visibility is key to the safety of you and your dog. There are reflective strips on the dog harness and leash, which can increase visibility at night and pre-dawn hours to keep your dog safe.
Attention: Sizing does NOT directly correspond to your pet’s breed or weight. Please MEASURE your pet by size guide which has a measuring tape and refer to our sizing chart for the best fit before ordering, If you need help, please feel free to contact us, our service team will always help you!

A Good Walk Starts with Comfort—for Both You and Your Dog!

Waldsmuller No Pull Adjustable Dog Harness and Leash Set – Designed for Your Dog, and You.

Enjoying a walk in the park with your dog obediently at your heels is a dream activity of many pet owners. It is very convenient and safe for dogs to have a comfortable no pull vest harness and leash combination.

  • The dog harness has different size and color can be selected,
  • Harness is equipped with a traction rope of the black color,
  • A comfortable cushion cotton is added to the handshaking part of the traction rope.
  • Prevent the hand from being injured due to excessive tension.
  • It is convenient, beautiful and comfortable.

  • Our non-pulling dog harness is specially designed with 2 metal D shape clip for safer dog walks.
  • The harness for dogs is made with a soft, breathable air mesh, which is high-density, soft and comfortable, and can prevent chewing or tearing.
  • This lightweight dog harness is perfect for walks all year round.

What you will get:

  • 1 X Dog harness
  • 1 X Dog Leash
  • 1 X Dog Collar

From the brand

Rookie Driver Car Magnets

Student Driver Car Magnet

We are committed to researching magnetic student driving signs, decals and stickers. Our mission is to ensure that every driver has a more enjoyable and comfortable driving experience, to allow other drivers to tolerate you with more space and respect, to reduce the nervousness of new drivers while preventing the possibility of accidents.

Christmas Gifts

A great gift for your family, friends, colleagues and neighbours in the run up to Christmas!

➽STRONGEST MAGNETS: The student driver car magnet is made of 0.7mm thick strong magnet. Compared with other magnets, it is thicker, stronger, more durable and be patient student driver magnet can be more firmly attached to the surface of the car, we have tested for a long time at high speed, heavy rain and snow and never fall off. Tip: Magnets can only be attached to metal surfaces, not to plastic or aluminum parts.
➽HIGHLY REFLECTIVITY: New driver magnet for car is made of high quality waterproof and heat resistant materials through strong magnetic and highly reflective materials to maximize the amount of light reflected from the sign, attracting people’s attention and ensuring that the rookie driver car magnet is clearly visible even at night, in fog and rain, and other drivers can notice you from the side and back of the car. An excellent tool for teens with no driving experience.
➽Unique design: New driver sticker signs will be displayed humorously and can make others aware that you are learning to drive, then they will be tolerant of providing you with more space and respect and reduce the possibility of annoying honking while controlling the speed of their car to prevent an accident. Student driver magnet also can reduce the level of nervousness teen driver feel when driving.
➽Removable and Reusable: Student driver signs for car removable, easily removable or transferable thanks to the magnetized backing. All driver magnets can be removed and reattached anytime. You can easily transfer it to another car when it is needed. Perfect as a gift for your family, colleagues, friends during various holidays, parties, birthdays
➽100% Satisfaction Guarantee: We are dedicated to providing the best quality new driver sticker for car to our customers. If you are in any way dissatisfied with our please be patient student driver magnet, please contact us and we will do our best to provide you a satisfactory reply.
